appetizers.name: Crispy Calamari
appetizers.description: Lightly breaded and fried calamari, served with a spicy marinara sauce.

appetizers.name: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Toasted baguette topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, basil, and a balsamic glaze.

mains.name: Margherita Pizza
mains.description: Classic pizza with a San Marzano tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

mains.name: Grilled Salmon
mains.description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with roasted asparagus and a lemon-dill sauce.

drinks.name: Craft Beer
drinks.description: A hoppy IPA from a local brewery.
